QuestData.Title: Kartak's Rampage
QuestData.Description: You the great Lich Hunter, eh? Good to have such strong Frenzyheart ally for battle. Maybe you strong enough to call Kartak even.$B$BBig battle at Kartak's Hold to southwest. Go kill spark big-tongues until you get good bit of Oracle Blood. Bring blood to altar in Kartak's Hold to call Kartak for delicious feast of big-tongue.$B$BKartak take your body if you worthy... with Kartak's powers, you slaughter more big-tongues than even best dreams.$B$BGo kill lots, hunter!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring a pure sample of Oracle Blood to the Altar of Kartak to summon Kartak. With the aid of Kartak's shared powers, slaughter 50 of the nearby Sparktouched Gorlocs for Shaman Jakjek in Kartak's Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: So many big-tongues to kill! So fun, eh?
QuestData.RewardText: Ritual went so easy for you!$b$bYou come back later for more killing someday, okay?
